job_title: Senior Career Services Specialist in Riverside, CA
pros: I love my team, the support I get from my Director and the on going training that we get within the IEC corporation. Helping students succeeding in the career path that they chose makes my work enjoyable. I think the companies benefits that is provided to employees are outstanding.
cons: I wish our campus had more space.

job_title: Associate Instructor in San Diego, CA
pros: Staff is very polite and fun to work. The faculties are well kept and cleaned daily. The EMT Program Class Room/Lab is fun and well stocked with their own ambulance. Instructors are very experienced and helpful during the 8 weeks of class. Extra study classes can be set-up with instructors prior to taking your NREMT Examination. Great job placement upon successful completion of the program and NREMT.
cons: Overtime for Instructors is limited as a company policy.

review_title: Easy job, good WL balance, mediocre pay

job_title: Career Services Specialist in Montclair, CA
pros: US Colleges values their students and works to create a safe and beneficial learning environment. As an employee you are supported and encouraged to do your best. They welcome ideas and suggestions with an open door policy. The staff gets along with another and works to help on another. They provide daily motivation and positive reinforcement. Management is involved and very in tune with whats going on at the campus level. I am extremely happy working at US Colleges.
cons: I honestly do not have any complaints. The only thing I wish I had was coffee provided for us in the break room! :)
